page.title: 04A SCHOOL DAY IN MATHERN.
page.content:
We start school at 9.15 a.m. and finish at 3.30 p.m. for five days every week. Every morning we have a religious assembly for about half an hour when we sing hymns, say prayers and hear a story told by our headmaster.
At lunch time we can have school dinners or bring a packed lunch to eat. We have a play-time in the morning and afternoon for about twenty minutes.
When we do our work we sit at tables with about six other children; sometimes we are quiet when we work but usually we are allowed to have a chat with our friends.
Altogether our school is the best school you could wish for.
